Header.paragraph: Helping You Solve Unplanned Process Downtime

About.paragraph: Process manufacturers lose 11% of annual revenue to unplanned downtime - up to $129 million per plant. Kausal combines deep engineering expertise with cutting-edge generative AI to prevent these losses. Our unique approach provides 24/7 expert monitoring of your entire process, detecting and diagnosing issues before they impact production. Early studies show a 40% reduction in downtime through thoughtful implementation of our solution.
Why: Holistic process analysis - we see the complete picture, not just individual assets
Clear, actionable insights - no black box solutions, just straightforward recommendations
Early warning system - detect issues months before they cause problems
Engineering-first approach - combining AI with real process expertise
